description.value:
Trigger Any of the four revelers within the hazard perform any action with the Move trait

Effect The pile collapses onto the four revelers, dealing @Damage[(1d6+5)[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:17|basic] save) to each of them. All four also take @Damage[1d6[persistent,bludgeoning]] damage until they're pulled from the rubble with a @Check[athletics|dc:17] check or can [[/act escape dc=17]].

Trigger An attempt to disable the hazard from outside critically fails, or someone attempts to clamber into the pile of lumber

Effect The pile collapses outward, inflicting @Damage[(1d6+5)[bludgeoning]] damage to the four revelers (@Check[reflex|dc:15|basic] save), and @Damage[(2d6+5)[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:17|basic] save) to all creatures in a 10-foot area surrounding the central 10-foot-square where the revelers were trapped.

stealth.details: (trained) to notice how the pile might fall on a person disabling it; DC 0 to see the pile.

details.description: Beams of heavy and sharp wood rest against one another to form a precariously balanced cage tied to several trip lines and tension-bearing dowels.
details.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:17] (trained), @Check[crafting|dc:17] (trained), or @Check[engineering-lore|dc:17] (trained) to figure out how to safely dismantle the pile without it collapsing on anyone.

publication.title: Pathfinder Seasons of Ghosts Hardcover Compilation
